chapter.title: OpenStack Dashboard (Horizon)
chapter.para: Using the OpenStack Dashboard, one can manage various OpenStack services. It may be used to manage instances and images, create keypairs, attach volumes to instances, manipulate Swift containers etc. The OpenStack Dashboard is accessible via http://<ip_address>

section.title: Login
section.para: Login to the dashboard with username "admin" and password "admin".

section.title: User Overview
section.para: After logging, depending on the access privileges, the user is allowed access to specific projects. The below is an overview page for a project belonging to the 'admin' user. One can view and download some basic usage metric reports here.

section.title: Instances
section.para: The page lists currently running instances belonging to the user 'admin'. From this page, one can terminate, pause, reboot any running instances, connect to vnc console of the instance etc.

section.title: Services
section.para: The list of services defiend can be viewed on this page.

section.title: Flavors
section.para: This page lists the currently available flavors that can be used to launch an instance. One can also create custom flavors on this page.

section.title: Images
section.para: This page lists the available images for the 'admin' user. One can also delete any images, if they are not required.

section.title: Projects
section.para: This page lists the available projects (tenants) that have been created. One can also create new projects, assign users to the projects etc.

section.title: Users
section.para: This page lists the users that have been created. One can also create new users, disable/delete existing users.

section.title: Users
section.para: This page lists the quota of resources allocated to a user; number of CPUs, amount of RAM, diskspace, max. number of instances that can be raised etc.

section.title: Project Overview
section.para: This page shows an overview of the project 'admin'. One can view and download some basic usage metric reports here.

section.title: Instances & Volumes
section.para: This page lists all the instances belonging to various users of the project, instance properties etc. It also list all the volumes that have been created and their status; whether available or attached to any running instances. One can also create new volumes and attach them to the instances on this page.

section.title: Instances - VNC Console
section.para: For a running instance, one can connect to the instance console via VNC.

section.title: Images & Snapshots
section.para: This page lists the custom images that have been uploaded. One can edit the image properties, delete and launch new instances of the images. This page also lists the snapshots taken from instances and volumes.

section.title: Access & Security
section.para: On this page, one can allocate and release floating ip addresses, associate and dissociate them to instances. New security groups can be created and one can modify the rules belonging to each security group.

section.title: Containers & Objects
section.para: On this page, one can create/delete containers, lists objects, upload/download objects and delete objects.
